name: Doctrine File Ages
description: Show recently modified doctrine files with timestamps
command: Get-ChildItem "{BOND_ROOT}\doctrine" -Recurse -File -Include *.md,*.json | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 25 @{N='File';E={$_.FullName.Replace("{BOND_ROOT}\",'')}}, @{N='Size';E={$_.Length}}, LastWriteTime | Format-Table -AutoSize
dry_run_text: Would list the 25 most recently modified doctrine files with timestamps
